long_description: Know how a Fruit Bar from That's It lives up to its name? It has only one ingredient: fruit. That's it. Each bar is only 100 calories and is vegan, gluten-free, non-GMO, kosher and diabetic friendly. Fruit gives you a natural energy boost; bar form is great for on-the-go snacking. No preservatives and no added sugar. 3 - 4g of fiber help you feel full longer and aid in digestion. Vitamins, minerals and antioxidants vary by type of fruit in each That's It Fruit Bar. *Discount will be applied when you check out. Offer not valid for sale-price items ending in $._3 or $._9.
